title: Classic lasagne with pepper and courgette
ingredients: ['1 courgette', '400g beef mince', '1 to 2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 to 2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 red peppers, seeded and cut into chunks', '300g fresh spinach', '1 small bunch fresh basil, chopped', '1 jar pasta sauce (e.g. tomato and garlic)', '1 (300g) packet whole wheat lasagne sheets', '1 ball fresh mozzarella, sliced', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
